item.title: Man City sign Guehi from Palace - what will he bring?
item.description: Man City sign Crystal Palace captain Marc Guehi for Â£20m - but what will the England defender add to Pep Guardiola's side?

item.title: Swiss deadly fire bar owners' lawyers condemn 'vindictiveness'
item.description: Lawyers for the Moretti couple say "lies" have been circulating about their clients, in their first public statement since the fire.

item.title: Is a Panenka ever the right choice for a penalty?
item.description: Following Morocco's last-minute spot-kick miss in the Africa Cup of Nations final, BBC Sport asks if a Panenka is ever the right choice for a penalty.

item.title: Gold and silver prices hit high after tariff threat
item.description: Donald Trump's plan to impose import taxes over Greenland pushed investors toward precious metals.

item.title: How could Europe respond to Trump's Greenland tariffs?
item.description: Europe is weighing up how to counter the US president's move against some of America's closest allies.
